cell_name.description: CellName appends the WebSphere cell identifier label to every exported time-series.
cell_name.title: Cell Name

cluster_name.description: ClusterName appends the WebSphere cluster identifier label to every exported time-series.
cluster_name.title: Cluster Name

collect_apps_matching.description: CollectAppsMatching filters Web applications by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).
collect_apps_matching.title: Collect Apps Matching

collect_cluster_metrics.description: CollectClusterMetrics toggles cluster-level health metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_cluster_metrics.title: Collect Cluster Metrics

collect_ejb_metrics.description: CollectEJBMetrics enables Enterprise Java Bean workload metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_ejb_metrics.title: Collect Ejb Metrics

collect_ejbs_matching.description: CollectEJBsMatching filters Enterprise Java Beans by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).
collect_ejbs_matching.title: Collect Ejbs Matching

collect_jca_metrics.description: CollectJCAMetrics toggles JCA resource-adapter metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_jca_metrics.title: Collect Jca Metrics

collect_jdbc_advanced.description: CollectJDBCAdvanced enables additional JDBC latency/timing statistics; defaults to disabled when unset.
collect_jdbc_advanced.title: Collect Jdbc Advanced

collect_jdbc_metrics.description: CollectJDBCMetrics toggles JDBC connection-pool metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_jdbc_metrics.title: Collect Jdbc Metrics

collect_jms_matching.description: CollectJMSMatching filters JMS destinations by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).
collect_jms_matching.title: Collect Jms Matching

collect_jms_metrics.description: CollectJMSMetrics toggles JMS destination metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_jms_metrics.title: Collect Jms Metrics

collect_jvm_metrics.description: CollectJVMMetrics toggles JVM runtime metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_jvm_metrics.title: Collect Jvm Metrics

collect_pools_matching.description: CollectPoolsMatching filters JDBC and JCA pools by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).
collect_pools_matching.title: Collect Pools Matching

collect_servlet_metrics.description: CollectServletMetrics enables servlet response-time metrics; defaults to enabled when unset (may add high-cardinality charts).
collect_servlet_metrics.title: Collect Servlet Metrics

collect_servlets_matching.description: CollectServletsMatching filters servlet contexts by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).
collect_servlets_matching.title: Collect Servlets Matching

collect_session_metrics.description: CollectSessionMetrics toggles HTTP session manager metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_session_metrics.title: Collect Session Metrics

collect_threadpool_metrics.description: CollectThreadPoolMetrics toggles thread-pool metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_threadpool_metrics.title: Collect Threadpool Metrics

collect_transaction_metrics.description: CollectTransactionMetrics toggles transaction manager metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_transaction_metrics.title: Collect Transaction Metrics

collect_webapp_metrics.description: CollectWebAppMetrics toggles Web application metrics (includes servlet/session data); defaults to enabled when unset.
collect_webapp_metrics.title: Collect Webapp Metrics

max_applications.description: MaxApplications caps the number of web applications charted (0 disables the limit).
max_applications.title: Max Applications

max_ejbs.description: MaxEJBs caps the number of Enterprise Java Beans charted (0 disables the limit).
max_ejbs.title: Max Ejbs

max_jca_pools.description: MaxJCAPools caps the number of JCA resource adapters charted (0 disables the limit).
max_jca_pools.title: Max Jca Pools

max_jdbc_pools.description: MaxJDBCPools caps the number of JDBC connection pools charted (0 disables the limit).
max_jdbc_pools.title: Max Jdbc Pools

max_jms_destinations.description: MaxJMSDestinations caps the number of JMS destinations charted (0 disables the limit).
max_jms_destinations.title: Max Jms Destinations

max_servlets.description: MaxServlets caps the number of servlet contexts charted when servlet collection is enabled (0 disables the limit).
max_servlets.title: Max Servlets

max_threadpools.description: MaxThreadPools caps the number of thread pools charted per server (0 disables the limit).
max_threadpools.title: Max Threadpools

node_name.description: NodeName appends the WebSphere node identifier label to every exported time-series.
node_name.title: Node Name

pmi_custom_stats_paths.description: PMICustomStatsPaths adds extra PMI XML paths when `pmi_stats_type` is set to `custom`.
pmi_custom_stats_paths.title: Pmi Custom Stats Paths

pmi_refresh_rate.description: PMIRefreshRate overrides the global PMI servlet refresh interval in seconds when a value >0 is provided.
pmi_refresh_rate.title: Pmi Refresh Rate

pmi_stats_type.description: PMIStatsType selects which PMI statistics tier to request (`basic`, `extended`, `all`, or `custom`).
pmi_stats_type.title: Pmi Stats Type

server_type.description: ServerType records the WebSphere server type label (for example `app_server`, `dmgr`, `nodeagent`).
server_type.title: Server Type

vnode.description: Vnode allows binding the collector to a virtual node.
vnode.title: Vnode
